Name: No God For Us
About the game: THE GAME NGfU is a platform adventure set in an post-cataclysmic Earth now shattered to pieces . Humanity is struggling to survive. Cities are in ruins and abandoned, the air is toxic, no food remains and there is no place to call home. You are Joshua Pirlock, a lone young man that arrives in a city thinking finally finding some food, water, or whatever he can that can be useful these hard days. A new city, new dangers! As you arrive, you immediately understand that you can't go back, which is one more problem added to your heavy to-do list. You need to find a way to leave this world too. THE GAMEPLAY The Gameplay is a mix between a classical platformer game and a adventure . The exploration and the story are the main focus in this game . Your journey will bring you to different places , dangers , puzzles and non-comfortable dark places . You have to find a way to solve the puzzles that Joshua finds in his path . A 2d Adventure-Platformer game with side scrolling mechanics Different desolated scenarios where everything is in ruin Very intense music that mixes blues and western Find out the story and make your right choises Every thing was made by one man
